```{r libs, include=FALSE}
# Loading libraries
source("libraries.R")

# Redundant?
source("functions.R")

# Options, configs, themes
options("warn"=-1)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
mtd_goal <- read_yaml("../config.yaml")$goals$mtd
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

`Mean Time to Detect` is the average time it took for a detection created by Cognito to be assigned to a cybersecurity analyst.

This represents the very first step in the process: a detection is triggered and a human is assigned to deal with it.

```{r}
notes_df <- read_log("../logs/notes.csv")

if_mti_exists <-
  notes_df %>%
  filter(custom_grep("btp|mtp|fp", note)) %>%
  check_data()

btp <- "0%"; mtp <- "0%"; fp <- "0%"
```

```{r, eval = if_mti_exists}
rm(btp, mtp, fp)

closures <- 
  read_log("../logs/new_notes.csv") %>%
  filter(custom_grep("btp|mtp|fp", note)) %>%
  mutate(
    btp = ifelse(custom_grep("btp", note), 1, 0),
    mtp = ifelse(custom_grep("mtp", note), 1, 0),
    fp = ifelse(custom_grep("fp", note), 1, 0)
  ) %>%
  unique()

#####
# To do: reduce # of lines by mapping thru these things
#####

# Current
c_w <- this_time(closures, "week") %>% list_top_stats()
c_m <- this_time(closures, "month") %>% list_top_stats()
c_q <- this_time(closures, "quarter") %>% list_top_stats()

# Last
l_w <- last_time(closures, "week") %>% list_top_stats()
l_m <- last_time(closures, "month") %>% list_top_stats()
l_q <- last_time(closures, "quarter") %>% list_top_stats()

```

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
assigned <- read_log("../logs/assigned.csv")
```

```{r}
# MTD is all based on assigned date
mtd <- "(no data yet)"
mtd_under <- "(no data yet)"

mtd_df <- assigned %>%
  select(fired, assigned_date) %>%
  filter(!is.na(assigned_date)) %>%
  mutate(td = as.double(assigned_date - fired, units="hours"))

if_data_exists <- check_data(mtd_df)
```

```{r, eval=if_data_exists}
mtd <- mean(mtd_df$td) %>% round(2)

mtd_under <- mtd_df %>%
  mutate(under_goal = ifelse(td<=mtd_goal,1,0)) %$%
  mean(under_goal) %>%
  (function(x) paste0(round(x*100,2),"%"))

df <- mtd_df %>%
  group_by(Day = as.Date(cut(fired, "day"))) %>%
  summarize(MTD = mean(td), .groups="keep")
```

```{r, eval = !if_data_exists, out.width='100%'}
msg <- "No data yet!\nAssign a detection to an analyst\n to see this page populate."
par(mar = c(0,0,0,0))
plot(c(0, 1), c(0, 1), ann = F, bty = 'n', type = 'n', xaxt = 'n', yaxt = 'n')
text(x = 0.5, y = 0.5, msg, cex = 1.6, col = "black")
```

## Data {.tabset}

**Goal**: MTD of under `r mtd_goal` hours. **The overall mean time to detect was `r mtd` hours.**

**`r mtd_under`** of detections had an MTD below the goal.

### Daily MTD (Line)

```{r, eval=if_data_exists, out.width='100%'}
ggplotly(
  ggplot(df) +
  geom_point(aes(x=Day, y=MTD)) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept=mtd_goal), color="red") +
  geom_line(aes(x=Day, y=MTD))
)
```

### Daily MTD (Trend)

```{r, eval=if_data_exists, out.width='100%'}
ggplotly(
  ggplot(df) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept=mtd_goal), color="red") +
  geom_smooth(aes(x=Day, y=MTD), formula = y ~ x, method = "loess") +
  geom_point(aes(x=Day, y=MTD))
)
```

*Note: Loess method will not populate until there are \> 5 data points to smooth over.*

### Histogram

```{r, eval=if_data_exists, out.width='100%'}
ggplotly(
  tooltip = c("x","y"),
  ggplot(df, aes(x=MTD)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=10, aes(fill=after_stat(count)))
)
```
